article_title: South Sudan President Calls for End to Ethnic Strife
article_text:
JUBA, South Sudan—The president urged an end to ethnic strife threatening to tear his young nation apart, but there was no sign of a letup in fighting in oil-rich regions of the impoverished country.

People fleeing the violence in South Sudan were overwhelming makeshift camps and some of the displaced said they were terrified of going home, an...
